text: The University of Edinburgh School of History, Classics and Archaeology is a school of the University of Edinburgh and the university's College of Arts, Humanities and Social Sciences (CAHSS). It has three divisions: history, classics, and archaeology. There are approximately 600 graduate students and 1500 undergraduate students. == Notable people == * Gordon Brown â€“ former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom == Journal == * Journal of Lithic StudiesJournal of Lithic Studies == References == Category:Edinburgh
title: University of Edinburgh School of History, Classics and Archaeology
